trans-unit.source: Represents a single property in an MSBuild project.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma única propriedade em um projeto MSBuild.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> object and uses the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> method to add content to the project.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo cria um objeto <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> e usa o método <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> para adicionar conteúdo ao projeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection> classes are used to add, remove, and change items in the project.
trans-unit.target: As classes <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> e <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection> são usadas para adicionar, remover e alterar itens no projeto.

trans-unit.source: The property name.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The property value.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty" /> class with the specified name and value.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty" /> com o nome e valor especificados.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to create a deep copy of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para criar uma cópia profunda do <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a deep or shallow copy of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia profunda ou superficial do <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia do <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: A shallow copy of a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty> references the same XML element as the original.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia superficial de uma <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty> referencia o elemento XML mesmo que o original.

trans-unit.source: Modifications to the name or value of a shallow copy will be reflected in both copies.
trans-unit.target: Modificações para o nome ou o valor de uma cópia superficial aparecerá em ambas as cópias.

trans-unit.source: However, depending on property evaluation, the two copies could have different <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.FinalValue%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, dependendo da avaliação de propriedade, as duas cópias podem ter diferentes <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.FinalValue%2A> valores de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: A deep copy of a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty> creates a new XML element to reference so that both copies of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty> can be independently modified.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia profunda de uma <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty> cria um novo elemento XML para fazer referência para que as cópias do <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty> podem ser modificadas de forma independente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <c>Condition</c> attribute value of the property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de atributo <c>Condição</c> da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <c>Condition</c> attribute value of the property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de atributo <c>Condição</c> da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the final value of the property after all property evaluations have been performed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor final da propriedade após todas as avaliações de propriedade terem sido executadas.

trans-unit.source: The final value of the property after all property evaluations have been performed.
trans-unit.target: O valor final da propriedade depois que todas as avaliações de propriedade foram executadas.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the property was imported into the project.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a propriedade foi importada para o projeto.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the property was imported into the project; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se a propriedade foi importada para o projeto; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the property name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The property name.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> object and uses the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> method to add content to the project.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo cria um objeto <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> e usa o método <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> para adicionar conteúdo ao projeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection> classes are used to add, remove, and change items in the project.
trans-unit.target: As classes <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> e <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection> são usadas para adicionar, remover e alterar itens no projeto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty" /> to convert to a string.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty" /> a ser convertido em uma cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: Converts a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty" /> to a <see langword="String" />.
trans-unit.target: Converte uma <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty" /> em uma <see langword="String" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" />, whose contents are the same as the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value" /> property of the <paramref name="propertyToCast" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="String" />, cujo conteúdo é o mesmo que a propriedade <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value" /> do parâmetro <paramref name="propertyToCast" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.ToString?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.ToString?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: Returns the string that represents the property <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma cadeia de caracteres que representa a propriedade <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value" />.

trans-unit.source: The string that represents the property <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value" />.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres que representa a propriedade <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the property value.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The property value.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> object and uses the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> method to add content to the project.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo cria um objeto <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> e usa o método <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> para adicionar conteúdo ao projeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection> classes are used to add, remove, and change items in the project.
trans-unit.target: As classes <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> e <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection> são usadas para adicionar, remover e alterar itens no projeto.
